messages.content: Better hospitals. Safer streets. Improved schools. Let's unlock Britain's future.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: £33.9 billion extra for the NHS. So your hospital and local GPs can give you the healthcare you need.
20,000 extra police officers. With the powers they need to keep us safe.
More funding for every pupil in every school. So your child gets a better education.
A growing economy that creates jobs and pays for our public services.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Your postal vote can secure a majority government – if you vote Conservative. Last time we were just NINE seats short of a majority. This election will be just as close.

issues.brexitEurope: Passing our Brexit deal – which is agreed and ready to go from day one. It protects jobs and trade...
issues.economy: A growing economy that creates jobs and pays for our public services.
issues.education: More funding for every pupil in every school. So your child gets a better education.

A growing economy that creates jobs and pays for our public services.
Passing our Brexit deal – which is agreed and ready to go from day one. It protects jobs and trade...

More funding for every pupil in every school. So your child gets a better education.
A growing economy that creates jobs and pays for our public services.
Passing our Brexit deal – which is agreed and ready to go from day one. It protects jobs and trade...
The last few years have been frustrating. I get it. I’ve been just as frustrated as you. We’ve had three years of a hung parliament that agrees on nothing except more arguments.
